thread.section_title: Play-Asia.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Play-Asia.com | www.play-asia.com | 8 of 305
thread.title: Sven S.

author: Sven S.
title: Sven S.
text:
After buying the game key, I was fowarded to my new account page and was first told I would need to verify my e-mail to receive my digital order. The e-mail verification worked without a hitch, then however I was also asked to very my mobile phone via a sms code - which I did not receive even after clicking "resend".
I got the game key after the e-mail verification though and the key was indeed the game I purchased, so aside from the little confunsion with the sms verification (which first made me think I would not receive my game, thus only 4 stars) it was a very quick and pleasnt purchase.
